reconciliation.title: Centralized Reconciliation

inventory.title: Automated Inventory
inventory.description: Real-time stock tracking with automatic deduction on every sale

chatbot.title: AI Business Assistant
chatbot.description: Ask questions about your business and get instant insights powered by AI

posIntegrations.title: POS Integrations
posIntegrations.description: Connect with your existing point-of-sale system seamlessly

automaticTips.title: Automatic Tips
automaticTips.description: Tips paid instantly and automatically to your staff. No manual calculations

competitivePricing.title: Competitive Rates
